column1: Master of Science in Applied Health Informatics
School of Professional and Continuing Studies

Learn how to design, develop and apply information systems in healthcare to deliver better patient outcomes and control costs.Applied Health Informaticscreates new opportunities for treatment and drug therapies through the use of artificial intelligence, big data, and advanced analytics. Fordham Universityâ€™s Master of Science in Applied Health Informatics provides students with a sound theoretical base in health informatics, together with practical insight and experience that will equip them for a professional career in the field.
Fees$1000 USD per credit, 36 credits. $70 application fee - waived if student attends information session
